clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: The client ID of your app you created in the Daikin Developer Portal

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: The client Secret of your app you created in the Daikin Developer Portal

redirectUri.title: Redirect URI
redirectUri.description: The redirect URI where the authorisation token will be send to. This is most likely your Homebridge instance IP address (Daikin blocks "localhost"). This URI should also be set for your app in the Daikin Developer Portal. For example: https://192.168.0.160:8581

port.title: Port
port.description: The port of your Homebridge instance. For example: 8581

showExtraFeatures.title: Show advanced features
showExtraFeatures.description: Expose extra advanced features as streamer mode, econo mode and powerful mode. They will only appear when they are also supported by your device.

excludedDevicesByDeviceId.title: Exclude specific devices
excludedDevicesByDeviceId.description: Exclude specific devices by their device id. You can find the device id in the Homebridge logs (debug mode does not have to be on)
